title: Why your Google Tag Manager set-up needs a spring clean | Torchbox

metadata.description: In our latest blog, Senior Web Analyst Gareth Beck explores Google Tag Manager's (GTM) role in web analytics and how it's often overlooked as a way to make your website work better for your visitors.
